title: Problems with mastery pages swapping.
body: In a few of my games the masteries haven't swapped over properly. My internet and connection is fine, and when I've selected the masteries they come up with the right names, but when I get ingame I find out that I'm playing ADC with the keystone that boosts sheilds to allies. Anyone else facing the same problem?

replies.body:
Can confirm happening to me too.

Can also confirm that its an LCU specific problem as it works on the live client just fine.

My guess would be its visually updating the client but not sending the packet to riots servers saying the mastery page choice has changed.

I also had this issue intermittently when dynamic queue first came out over on live so may be related.

Hi folks

Are you still seeing this happening after the latest update?

cheers!
Mindstar
Its been happening ever since the drop down box for mastery pages was gone like what we have runes. That is the main issue behind it that I have
Yep, happens to me all the time. Only happens when you don't go into edit mastery and select it that way though.

Yes this is happening to me as well.

swapping from the drop down list in the champion screen won't change the page.

To successfully swap pages I clicked the pencil/pen icon next to the list box, after that choose the page I want from the drop down list in the top left, and that one will be active.
Can also confirm this. And due to the alpha client being a bit laggy it sometimes leads to me taking ad/ap on an ap/ad champion
